ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class ClaimantAddClaimActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.ClaimantAddClaimActivity

  • public class ClaimantAddClaimActivity
extends Activity
    This ClaimantAddClaimActivity class is an extended class of Activity class. This class will control the interface of Claim detail and ClaimList for claimant. This view displays Claim details and creates an option menu, a finish add button, a starting date picker and an ending date picker. It will be used when the claimant asks to access to the Claim detail. The associated class including ClaimantAddClaimController, Claim, ClaimList and ClaimListManager.
    Version:
    03/16/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
